# Cabañas Ucihuen

> Cabin rental accommodations in Lago Puelo, Chubut, Argentina.

Cabañas Ucihuen offers cozy cabin rentals in the heart of Villa Turística Lago Puelo, Patagonia Argentina. Located just two blocks from the town center and less than 3 km from Parque Nacional Lago Puelo.

## Cabins

- Cabin for 7 guests: Two floors, 2 bedrooms, living-dining room, kitchen, bathroom
- Cabin for 4 guests: One floor, 1 bedroom, kitchen-dining room, living room with futons, bathroom

## Amenities

Pet-friendly, internal parking, heating, WiFi, grill, hot water, satellite TV, bathroom kit, bedding, outdoor patio, fire extinguisher, hair dryer, kitchen equipment, smoking area, extra pillows and blankets, first aid kit.

## Location

Villa Turística Lago Puelo, Chubut, Argentina.
Near Parque Nacional Lago Puelo — boating, kayaking, hiking trails, beaches, forests, and waterfalls.
